alert.note: Alert for Cheshire (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 4:49PM EDT until July 12 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN CHESHIRE COUNTY... At 449 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sullivan, or near Keene, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Keene, Peterborough, Antrim, Dublin, Harrisville, Nelson, Gilsum, Marlow, Roxbury, Walpole, Sullivan, Alstead, Surry, Hancock, Marlborough, Westmoreland and Langdon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
